data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Souss Massa, Morocco a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Souss Massa, Morocco

data.prayer: Over 99.81 percent of the people of Souss Massa are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, encourage your church in Souss Massa that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Souss Massa.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Berber, Southern Shilha people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Berber, Southern Shilha people know you.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Souss Massa that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Souss Massa unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, teach the young people in the state of Souss Massa to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.
